sr = 44100 kr = 4410 ksmps = 10 nchnls = 1
; non-normalized function table with a sample 1 giFile ftgen 1, 0, 0, -1, "fox.wav", 0, 0, 0

a1 poscil3 kamp, kcps, ifn, iphs out a1 endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> i1 0 2.756 1 1 0 i1 3 2.756 1 -1 0 i1 6 1.378 1 .5 2.067 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
